name: Soul Control
description:
LOCAL MULTIPLAYER ONLY - Please don't rate if you only tried it alone.

CHARACTER CONTROLS: Move with WASD/Arrow Keys. Shoot with Spacebar

GHOST CONRTOLS: Move with Mouse. Cycle through abilities with mouse-wheel, use with LMB. Possess/Leave turrets with RMB, shoot turret with LMB.

Objective Notes:

  • Blue (player 1) starts as the character, red (player 2) starts as the ghost.
  • Blue (player 1) needs to get to the right side of the map, where red urn is and destroy it.
  • Red (player 2) needs to kill player 1 in order to get control of the character. Then go all the way to the left where the blue urn is and destroy it.
